2107220.name: The Legend of Capa Negra
2107220.description:
"The Legend of Capa Negra" is a souls-like Action-RPG set in a medieval, dark fantasy world.

As a new member of the Rebel Faction, your first mission will be to travel to a small village to meet a contact, find your way through dangerous landscapes and join the war against the King!

• Skill-based combat system with dozens of spectacular execution moves

• Complete quests, fight, trade, gather and craft

• 3 different classes

• Discover hidden areas, secret passages, and more mysteries in a handcrafted world

• Swords, spears, bows, axes, maces, magic wands - an arsenal of weapons and armors
